title: Chinese Nuclear Submarine Sinks In Major Embarrassment For Beijing: Report
content: China's newest nuclear-powered attack submarine sank earlier this year, a senior US defence official said on Thursday, a potential embarrassment for Beijing as it seeks to expand its military capabilities.
summary: China's newest nuclear-powered attack submarine sank earlier this year, a senior US defence official said on Thursday, a potential embarrassment for Beijing as it seeks to expand its military capabilities.

title: After 100-Year Hypothesis, Scientists Find Cells That Could Heal Wounds
content: These cells can transform into endothelial cells and macrophages, aiding in blood vessel growth and tissue repair, particularly when triggered by injury or poor blood flow.
summary: These cells can transform into endothelial cells and macrophages, aiding in blood vessel growth and tissue repair, particularly when triggered by injury or poor blood flow.

title: US Mom Finds Son Sweaty, Discovers Body In His Vehicle. Then This Happens
content: "What have you done?" A mother's haunting question pierced the air after she discovered a human foot near their family RV in Texas, US.
summary: "What have you done?" A mother's haunting question pierced the air after she discovered a human foot near their family RV in Texas, US.

title: Hurricane Helene Makes Landfall In Florida
content: The "extremely dangerous" Hurricane Helene made landfall in the US state of Florida on Thursday, with officials warning of "unsurvivable" conditions and a potentially catastrophic storm surge high enough to swamp a two-story house.
summary: The "extremely dangerous" Hurricane Helene made landfall in the US state of Florida on Thursday, with officials warning of "unsurvivable" conditions and a potentially catastrophic storm surge high enough to swamp a two-story house.

title: US Living Through "Worst Border Crisis In History Of World", Says Trump
content: For nearly four years, the United States has been experiencing its worst border crisis in the history of the world, Republican presidential candidate and former president Donald Trump said.
summary: For nearly four years, the United States has been experiencing its worst border crisis in the history of the world, Republican presidential candidate and former president Donald Trump said.

title: Glass Bottle With 200-Year-Old Message Found At French Archaeological Site
content: The discovery has excited historians, as it offers insights into past excavation methods and the history of the area. The bottle, typically used for smelling salts, has been described as a rare archaeological "time capsule."
summary: The discovery has excited historians, as it offers insights into past excavation methods and the history of the area. The bottle, typically used for smelling salts, has been described as a rare archaeological "time capsule."

title: Major Boost To India's Bid For Permanent Seat At UN Security Council
content: UK Prime Minister Keir Starmer on Thursday backed India's bid for a permanent membership of the United Nations Security Council (UNSC), days after US President Joe Biden and France's Emmanuel Macron made a similar pitch.
summary: UK Prime Minister Keir Starmer on Thursday backed India's bid for a permanent membership of the United Nations Security Council (UNSC), days after US President Joe Biden and France's Emmanuel Macron made a similar pitch.

title: Harris Leads Trump In Several Key Battleground States, Polls Say
content: US Vice President Kamala Harris has taken the lead over her Republican presidential rival Donald Trump in several key battleground states like Arizona, Michigan and Pennsylvania, according to various polls released here.
summary: US Vice President Kamala Harris has taken the lead over her Republican presidential rival Donald Trump in several key battleground states like Arizona, Michigan and Pennsylvania, according to various polls released here.

title: "Will Speak In Action, Not Words": Netanyahu Defiant Over Lebanon
content: An Israeli strike on Beirut killed another Hezbollah commander on Thursday as Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu defied calls by his key backer the United States for a 21-day ceasefire in Lebanon.
summary: An Israeli strike on Beirut killed another Hezbollah commander on Thursday as Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu defied calls by his key backer the United States for a 21-day ceasefire in Lebanon.

title: Elon Musk's X Abides By Supreme Court Orders In Brazil, Seeks Lift Of Ban
content: Elon Musk's X told Brazil's Supreme Court it has complied with orders to stop the spread of misinformation and asked a judge to lift a ban on the platform, in a major retreat by the billionaire battling "censorship".
summary: Elon Musk's X told Brazil's Supreme Court it has complied with orders to stop the spread of misinformation and asked a judge to lift a ban on the platform, in a major retreat by the billionaire battling "censorship".

title: Tech Giant Dell Calls Global Sales Team Back To Office Starting Next Monday
content: Dell Technologies said on Thursday that their global sales team employees who are able to work from the company offices must do so five days a week, starting Sept. 30, according to a memo seen by Reuters.
summary: Dell Technologies said on Thursday that their global sales team employees who are able to work from the company offices must do so five days a week, starting Sept. 30, according to a memo seen by Reuters.

title: Biden Signs Government Funding Bill To Avert Shutdown Before Election
content: US President Joe Biden has signed a three-month government funding bill, averting an imminent shutdown and delaying a fuller conversation about government spending until after the November elections, media reported.
summary: US President Joe Biden has signed a three-month government funding bill, averting an imminent shutdown and delaying a fuller conversation about government spending until after the November elections, media reported.

title: Israel Says It Intercepted Yemeni Missile
content: The Israeli army said it intercepted a missile that was fired from Yemen after sirens and explosions were heard early on Friday.
summary: The Israeli army said it intercepted a missile that was fired from Yemen after sirens and explosions were heard early on Friday.

title: Hurricane Helene Strengthens To Category 4 As It Nears Florida's Gulf Coast
content: A powerful hurricane was barreling towards Florida on Thursday, with officials warning of "unsurvivable" conditions and a potentially catastrophic storm surge high enough to swamp a two-story house.
summary: A powerful hurricane was barreling towards Florida on Thursday, with officials warning of "unsurvivable" conditions and a potentially catastrophic storm surge high enough to swamp a two-story house.

title: Trump To Meet Zelensky In New York Today
content: Donald Trump said he would meet Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky on Friday in New York, one day after the White House hopeful slammed Ukraine's leader for refusing to strike a deal with Russia over the war.
summary: Donald Trump said he would meet Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky on Friday in New York, one day after the White House hopeful slammed Ukraine's leader for refusing to strike a deal with Russia over the war.

title: Palestinian President Calls For End To Israeli "Genocide" In UN Speech
content: Palestinian President Mahmoud Abbas received a long round of applause as he addressed the United Nations General Assembly (UNGA), insisting that "we will not leave, Palestine is our homeland," and "if anyone were to leave it would be the occupier".
summary: Palestinian President Mahmoud Abbas received a long round of applause as he addressed the United Nations General Assembly (UNGA), insisting that "we will not leave, Palestine is our homeland," and "if anyone were to leave it would be the occupier".

title: Watch: Joe Biden Brings New Gun Control Law By Way Of US Presidential Order
content: Weeks before his term as US President comes to an end, Joe Biden signed a new executive order today to address the problem of gun violence in the US.
summary: Weeks before his term as US President comes to an end, Joe Biden signed a new executive order today to address the problem of gun violence in the US.

title: Russia Says New Nuclear Doctrine Is "Warning' To West"
content: The Kremlin said Thursday that an updated nuclear doctrine that will allow Moscow to use nuclear weapons against non-nuclear states should be seen as a warning to the West.
summary: The Kremlin said Thursday that an updated nuclear doctrine that will allow Moscow to use nuclear weapons against non-nuclear states should be seen as a warning to the West.

title: Biden Says "Russia Won't Prevail" As He Hosts Zelensky In White House
content: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky met Joe Biden at the White House Thursday to present his wartime "victory plan," after the US president announced an $8 billion surge in military aid for Kyiv's fight against Russia.
summary: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky met Joe Biden at the White House Thursday to present his wartime "victory plan," after the US president announced an $8 billion surge in military aid for Kyiv's fight against Russia.

title: Hezbollah Drone Unit Head Killed In Airstrike: Israeli Military
content: The Israeli military said Thursday its latest strike on south Beirut killed Mohammed Srur, the head of Hezbollah's drone unit, who a source close to the group had earlier said was the target.
summary: The Israeli military said Thursday its latest strike on south Beirut killed Mohammed Srur, the head of Hezbollah's drone unit, who a source close to the group had earlier said was the target.
